alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Sauk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 14 at 7:46PM CDT until July 14 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN COLUMBIA AND NORTHEASTERN SAUK COUNTIES... At 745 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Baraboo, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Baraboo, Portage, Wisconsin Dells, Lake Wisconsin, Lake Delton, West Baraboo, Bluffview, North Freedom, Rock Springs, Interstate 90/94 Interchange, and Devils Lake St Park. Those attending the Sauk County Fair are in the path of this storm and should prepare for IMMINENT DANGEROUS WEATHER CONDITIONS. SEEK SHELTER NOW! People attending The Sauk County Fair should seek safe shelter immediately! HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
